summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CallVault production hardening. All critical features work without DATABASE_URL including identity registration, contacts API, call session tokens, and WebSocket messaging. Frontend loads correctly with proper navigation and identity creation flow.

configuration_issues.issue: DATABASE_URL not configured - using in-memory fallbacks
configuration_issues.impact: All DB operations use ephemeral storage without replay protection
configuration_issues.recommendation: This is intentional for production hardening - in-memory fallbacks working as designed

configuration_issues.issue: Error seeding platform pricing due to null database connection
configuration_issues.recommendation: Expected behavior when DATABASE_URL not set - pricing defaults to free tier

passed_tests: Contacts API (GET /api/contacts/:address) - returns empty array without database
Call session token (POST /api/call-session-token) - returns ICE servers and tokens
WebSocket connection (/ws) - accepts connections and handles registration
Full flow: Create identity → WebSocket connect → Register → Send message
Frontend loads correctly with proper navigation
Open App button works and navigates to main interface
Create New Identity button found and clickable
No console errors or visible error messages in UI
Professional UI with proper branding and dark theme
